title: I tried to access my old account from 2010 and Riot does not help
body:
I have tried to log in and play onto my account from 2010, (I am writing this from friends account )
When I login into LoL.client it says '' 'In order to protect your account , we're rolling out new password requierments.You must change your League of Legends password immediatly before you log in to play
To change your password ,click here ( hyperlink ) '' 
When I click onto that hyperlink I LOG INTO MY ACCOUNT ( I get option to change password,and when I try to,it says ''wrong/invalid password'' When I try to get into my account I get 401 error - you do not have premission to access 
Riot does not reply to my emails or support tickets,can anyone else help me to play on my account 
And when I tried to post this from MY ACCOUNT it says I am not even lvl 1!..
Rito pls

replies.body: second day without help,anyone please help out I really wanna play with friends now when we all have some days off
You're really impatient, wait until they get it solved, end of the day its your own fault for failing to keep the details.

It's my fault because Riot game's system fucked up my old account? (I am not talking about all rioters or people that work with or for company I am talking about this bullshit system obviously deleted my old account )
Seems legit to talk about something you do not have any info on, please,fuck off from this post I asked for help not for cocksucker club on my back.

Unfortunately, we can't really assist with this on the boards due to the nature of sensitive account information.  Even if you're unable to recover your account, it's okay to try again.  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can re-investigate.  

We don't want to restore access unless we are absolutely sure an account is being restored to the owner.   If you've already filled out a form, let me know the ticket number and I'd be happy to check on the status.  I hope that helps!

Yes thank you,I did everything I could multiple times for like 2 hours,I am totally sure I did not make any typo and everything about my account is gone,this is info
I filled out account recovery last day
#26921476

I was able to see that your ticket was successfully received!  It's going to be escalated up to our account recovery team, who will investigate your case.  This can take a few moments, and it's important not to reply to your ticket until you've received a response as that can drop you to the bottom of the queue..  Hang on until then!
Okay I hope to get some new info in next 16 hours,thanks.
